SELECT t.* FROM r_sys_res t INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT sf.`sr_id` FROM r_sys_function sf INNER JOIN ( SELECT DISTINCT rp.`sf_id` FROM `r_role_permission` rp INNER JOIN `r_user_role` ur ON rp.`role_id` = ur.`role_id` WHERE ur.`username` = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ) sf2 ON sf.`sf_id` = sf2.sf_id
) tt ON t.`sr_id` = tt.sr_id ORDER BY t.sr_id DESC
